title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora Impressions - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.06.23
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code kindafunny for 50% off 2 or more pairs of polarized sunglasses.

Bless is back with Tim for a HUGE news day. Avatar: Fronters of Pandora Reviews, Day of The Devs, Bungie and PlayStation news, Donkey Kong coming to Super Nintendo World, and a bunch of Game Awards headlines.

 - A new Gamescast is up and it’s our Game Awards Announcement predictions! Youtube.com/Kindafunnygames
 - The final episode of Kinda Anime is up NOW on YouTube.com/KindaFunny and Screencast podcast feeds around the globe! Mike and Barrett share their top 5 anime of all time, give their impressions so far on Haikyuu, and are joined by special guest Tamoor Hussain!
 - Janet and I are doing a Kinda Funny Meet Up during Game Awards! It’s going down after the Giant Bomb Live show on Saturday from 3pm to 4:30pm at Karl Strauss Brewery. Come through!
